ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1475 â€” Good Manufacturing Practices)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1475 - GOOD MANUFACTURING PRACTICES) in order to (1) extend the drug Good Manufacturing Practices requirements set out in the Food and Drug Regulations such that they apply to all active ingredients; (2) extend the drug establishment licensing requirement set out in the Food and Drug Regulations such that they apply to active ingredient fabricators, packagers/labellers, testers and importers; and (3) create a new record-keeping requirement to foster the traceability of active ingredients from the original fabricator to the dosage-form drug manufacturer.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0074 Publication Date: 2013-05-08
AttachmentsAttachment
